mapper.insert: insert into T_RELET_APPLY (RELET_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREA_TIME, RETREA_TYPE, SINGLE_PRICE, SUBTOTAL, PRIVILEGE_SUM, LEASE_DEPOSIT, TOTAL, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME,RETREA_END_TIME) values (#{reletApplyId}, #{houseInfoId}, #{clientName}, #{houseAcreage}, #{leaseStartTime}, #{leaseEndTime}, #{type}, #{retreaTime}, #{retreaType}, #{singlePrice}, #{subtotal}, #{privilegeSum}, #{leaseDeposit}, #{total}, #{creationTime}, #{updateTime},#{retreaEndTime})
mapper.update: update T_RELET_APPLY set HOUSE_INFO_ID = #{houseInfoId}, CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName}, HOUSE_ACREAGE = #{houseAcreage}, LEASE_START_TIME = #{leaseStartTime}, LEASE_END_TIME = #{leaseEndTime}, TYPE = #{type}, RETREA_TIME = #{retreaTime}, RETREA_TYPE = #{retreaType}, SINGLE_PRICE = #{singlePrice}, SUBTOTAL = #{subtotal}, PRIVILEGE_SUM = #{privilegeSum}, LEASE_DEPOSIT = #{leaseDeposit}, TOTAL = #{total}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime}, RETREA_END_TIME=#{retreaEndTime} where RELET_APPLY_ID = #{reletApplyId}
mapper.select: select RELET_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREA_TIME, RETREA_TYPE, SINGLE_PRICE, SUBTOTAL, PRIVILEGE_SUM, LEASE_DEPOSIT, TOTAL, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME,RETREA_END_TIME from T_RELET_APPLY where RELET_APPLY_ID = #{reletApplyId}

select RELET_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREA_TIME, RETREA_TYPE, SINGLE_PRICE, SUBTOTAL, PRIVILEGE_SUM, LEASE_DEPOSIT, TOTAL, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME,RETREA_END_TIME from T_RELET_APPLY

select RELET_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, CLIENT_NAME, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREA_TIME, RETREA_TYPE, SINGLE_PRICE, SUBTOTAL, PRIVILEGE_SUM, LEASE_DEPOSIT, TOTAL, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME,RETREA_END_TIME from T_RELET_APPLY WHERE HOUSE_INFO_ID=#{houseIfoId}
